faculties_accepted: 14 study tracks on the Paris Campus
3 fields of research on the Eurecom campus: Networking and security, Multimedia communications, Mobile communications
module_restrictions: Students must have completed at least 4 semesters of undergraduate studies before participating in exchange programme at TELECOM ParisTech.
visa_info: Long-stay visas are necessary for stays exceeding 3 months.
Students can apply up to 3 months prior to the departure.

accommodations_info.University Accommodation: The association that manages the student housing for Télécom ParisTech students is called Maison des Élèves (nicknamed “la Maisel”).

university_description: Telecom ParisTech is a French engineering school specializing in ICT and founded in 1878. It is located in Paris, France, and it is one of the leading engineering schools in the country.
location_cost_of_living: Paris is known to be an expensive city, with a high cost of living compared to other cities in France and Europe.
location_weather: Paris has an oceanic climate, with mild summers and cool winters, and rainfall distributed throughout the year.
location_description: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France, known for its iconic landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame Cathedral, and Louvre Museum, among others. It is also a major center for art, fashion, culture, and a popular tourist destination.
location_crime: Paris is considered a safe city overall, but petty crime such as pickpocketing and bag-snatching is common, particularly in crowded areas and tourist attractions.
location_transportation: Paris has an extensive public transportation system consisting of metro, buses, trams, and regional trains, making it easy to get around the city and nearby areas.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Paris, with a variety of restaurants and shops serving Middle Eastern and North African cuisine.
location_vegetarian: Paris has a growing number of vegetarian and vegan options, with many restaurants and cafes offering vegetarian and vegan menu items.
